entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 02:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: N 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 9:02 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:02 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 9:02 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
